main event: A pilot reported observing an unidentified flying object hovering over Lake Huron, Michigan, emitting a bright light and appearing egg-shaped, which accelerated away suddenly.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be approximately 100 feet in length., The object remained stationary for a short duration before making a rapid departure., Ground observers also reported seeing the same object., The sighting was made around 2125 EST on August 22, 1954., The incident remains unresolved and classified as unidentified.
